text: Aleksandr Vasilyevich Privalov (; 6 August 1933 - 19 May 2021) was a Soviet biathlete. He received a bronze medal at the 1960 Winter Olympics in Squaw Valley. He received a silver medal at the 1964 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck. Privalov was born in Moscow Oblast, RSFSR, Soviet Union. Privalov died on 19 May 2021, aged 87."Сердце перестало биться": Знаменитого биатлониста Александра Привалова нашли мёртвым ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Skiers Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Sport shooters
title: Aleksandr Privalov
